description:
Nobunaga is headed to Kyoto and sends messengers to Rokkaku Shotei in southern Oumi, but he refuses to help in any way. Feeling like he has no other choice, Nobunaga heads to southern Oumi with an army of 60,000. However, the Rokkaku Clan had the 53 Leaders of Koga working with them.
Source: crunchyroll
